Author: orange sunshine#8588
Content: got a similar question, submitted the form today and had an uneasy feeling the c&p didn't paste correctly. Is there a way to verify the address i submitted before sending the confirming xact ?

Author: orange sunshine#8588
Content: or maybe a better question, if the address isn't valid will i be connected ?

Author: orange sunshine#8588
Content: contacted

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@orange sunshine you will definitely be contacted if you address is not valid
you can also resubmit the form with correct address
if the first one and this are identical, no problem
if the first one is invalid and this is valid , the second one will be the recalim address

Author: orange sunshine#8588
Content: got it, thanks

Author: orange sunshine#8588
Content: ah, now i know why the address looked wrong when i submitted, the edit  box for the  address isn't long enough to show the whole address. So looks like it's truncated

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: `komodo-cli -ac_name=ACNAME setgenerate true 1`

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: where ACNAME is the name of the assetchain you created

Content: yes done that exact cmd with -ac_name

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: use `komodo-cli -ac_name=ACNAME getblockcount`

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: if  returns >  0, genesis block has been mined
